instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.objectiveText: Pick wood from the pile without disturbing the dangerous creatures hiding there.
instructions.click: Click on wood to pick it
instructions.tip1: Be careful - some wood pieces might cause the pile to collapse!
instructions.tip2: Keep track of your health - creatures can hurt you.
instructions.tip3: Earn points by picking wood safely.
